page.title: 03CHURCH INTERIOR
page.content: The {east window of the nave} is perpendicular in style,and has been presented by the Earl Manvers in memory of his sister,Lady Annora Williams Wynn, Wife of Charles Watkin Williams Wynn Esq.,M.P. of Coed y Maen,Meifod. The {relic of earliest date belonging {to the church is a coffin lid,}now standing against the west wall of the south aisle of the church.It was removed to this place from a recumbent position in which it was previously placed near the chancel rails. It is supposed, traditionally, to have covered the remains of one of the Princes of Powys.
